title: The Red Trade
description: A tale of suffering and injustice.Unlikely hero Glenn Ridgely teams up with young and beautiful Kenyan Ruth, and world weary police sergeant Morgan Kiplagat in a race across East Africa and beyond to save the lives of a group of abducted children.Follow the nightmare faced by young albino Anita, and the twins Junior and Uncle as they are swallowed by The Red Trade.Two must die for one to live!
author: Andy  Lang
